quote.introtext: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
quote.text: Surely We have given you Kausar,
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Therefore pray to your Lord and make a sacrifice.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Surely your enemy is the one who shall be without posterity.
quote.author: Qur'an
